name: Thare fabula est occultatum (prototype)
description:
This is a prototype, with only bare bones and a a small idea for the core game. I will be adding a lot more mechanics to the game, but for now.... enjoy?

p.s; assets obviously made by me besides one of the trees. Unreal system being used as well. 

There are still bugs in the game especially the inventory system where you can get more by duplication, I will Patch up in the next.
